languages.text: "В отсутствие Мастера вокса я допросил команду и выяснил, что сообщения о розыске, которые отправляет Имперский флот, полностью игнорируются. Я подозреваю, что высший офицер Толиман злоупотребляет вашим доверием".

traits.locale_text: "В отсутствие вокс-мастера я допросил команду и выяснил, что сообщения о розыске, которые отправляет Имперский Флот, полностью игнорируются. Я подозреваю, что вокс-мастер злоупотребляет вашим доверием".

languages.text: "I questioned the crew in the Vox Master's absence and established that the wanted bulletins sent by the Imperial Navy were being completely ignored. I suspect that Senior Officer Toliman is abusing your trust."
languages.original_text: "В отсутствие Мастера вокса я допросил команду и выяснил, что сообщения о розыске, которые отправляет Имперский флот, полностью игнорируются. Я подозреваю, что высший офицер Толиман злоупотребляет вашим доверием".

traits.locale_text: "I questioned the crew in the Vox Master's absence and established that the wanted bulletins sent by the Imperial Navy were being completely ignored. I suspect that Senior Officer Toliman is abusing your trust."

"I questioned the crew in the Vox Master's absence and established that the wanted bulletins sent by the Imperial Navy were being completely ignored. I suspect that Senior Officer Toliman is abusing your trust."

languages.text: 「ヴォクス・マスターが不在の時にクルーたちに問いただしました。その結果、帝国海軍から送られた指名手配通達が完全に無視されていたことが判明しました。上級士官のトリマンがあなたの信頼を裏切っている可能性があります」
languages.original_text: "I questioned the crew in the Vox Master's absence and established that the wanted bulletins sent by the Imperial Navy were being completely ignored. I suspect that Senior Officer Toliman is abusing your trust."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォクス・マスターが不在の時にクルーたちに問いただしました。その結果、帝国海軍から送られた指名手配通達が完全に無視されていたことが判明しました。上級士官のトリマンがあなたの信頼を裏切っている可能性があります」

languages.text: "Voks Üstadı'nın yokluğunda mürettebatı sorguladım ve bunun neticesinde de İmparatorluk Donanması'nın gönderdiği aranma dosyalarının göz ardı edildiğini gördüm. Kıdemli Subay Toliman'ın güveninizi suistimal ettiğinden şüpheleniyorum."
languages.original_text: "I questioned the crew in the Vox Master's absence and established that the wanted bulletins sent by the Imperial Navy were being completely ignored. I suspect that Senior Officer Toliman is abusing your trust."

traits.locale_text: "Voks Üstadı'nın yokluğunda mürettebatı sorguladım ve bunun neticesinde de İmparatorluk Donanması tarafından gönderilmiş aranıyor bültenlerinin tamamen göz ardı edildiğini gördüm. Kıdemli Subay Toliman'ın, güveninizi suistimal ettiğinden şüpheleniyorum."

languages.text: «Interrogué a la tripulación en ausencia de la maestra de vocos y confirmé que los boletines de busca y captura enviados por la Armada Imperial estaban siendo completamente ignorados. Sospecho que la oficial Toliman abusa de su confianza».
languages.original_text: "I questioned the crew in the Vox Master's absence and established that the wanted bulletins sent by the Imperial Navy were being completely ignored. I suspect that Senior Officer Toliman is abusing your trust."

traits.locale_text: «Interrogué a la tripulación en ausencia de la maestra de vocos y confirmé que los boletines de busca y captura enviados por la Armada Imperial estaban siendo completamente ignorados. Sospecho que la oficial Toliman abusa de su confianza».

languages.text: “我在音阵大师不在场的情况下，对船员进行了询问，发现帝国海军发出的通缉令遭到了彻底无视。因此，我有理由怀疑高阶官员托里曼女士滥用了你的信任。”
languages.original_text: "I questioned the crew in the Vox Master's absence and established that the wanted bulletins sent by the Imperial Navy were being completely ignored. I suspect that Senior Officer Toliman is abusing your trust."

traits.locale_text: “我在音阵大师不在场的情况下，对船员进行了询问，发现帝国海军发出的通缉令遭到了彻底无视。因此，我有理由怀疑高阶官员托里曼女士滥用了你的信任。”

languages.text: « J'ai interrogé l'équipage en l'absence de la maîtresse-vox et établi que les fichiers des personnes recherchées envoyés par la Marine Impériale étaient systématiquement ignorés. Je suspecte l'officier vox supérieure Toliman d'abuser de votre confiance. »
languages.original_text: "I questioned the crew in the Vox Master's absence and established that the wanted bulletins sent by the Imperial Navy were being completely ignored. I suspect that Senior Officer Toliman is abusing your trust."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai interrogé l'équipage en l'absence de la maîtresse-vox et établi que les fichiers des personnes recherchées envoyés par la Marine Impériale étaient systématiquement ignorés. Je suspecte l'officier vox supérieure Toliman d'abuser de votre confiance. »

languages.text: "Ich habe die Crew in Abwesenheit der Voxmeisterin befragt und festgestellt, dass die von der imperialen Kriegsflotte geschickten Steckbriefe komplett ignoriert wurden. Ich vermute, Euer leitender Offizier Toliman missbraucht Euer Vertrauen."
languages.original_text: "I questioned the crew in the Vox Master's absence and established that the wanted bulletins sent by the Imperial Navy were being completely ignored. I suspect that Senior Officer Toliman is abusing your trust."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe die Crew in Abwesenheit der Voxmeisterin befragt und festgestellt, dass die von der imperialen Kriegsflotte geschickten Steckbriefe komplett ignoriert wurden. Ich vermute, Euer leitender Offizier Toliman missbraucht Euer Vertrauen."
